## May 10, 2025

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(plotly)
library(tseries)
# Generate white noise and create index
set.seed(123)
white_noise <- rnorm(100)
index <- 1:100
data <- data.frame(index = index, white_noise = white_noise)

# Proper Plotly call â€” all arguments named
fig <- plot_ly(data = data, 
               x = ~index, 
               y = ~white_noise, 
               type = 'scatter', 
               mode = 'lines+markers') %>%
  layout(title = "White Noise Time Series",
         xaxis = list(title = "Index"),
         yaxis = list(title = "Value"))

fig
```
